content: प्रशमः {@--1@} Calmness, tranquillity, composure; प्रशमस्थित पूर्वपार्थिवं <ls>R. 8. 15</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 32.</ls> {@--2@} Peace, rest. {@--3@} Extinction, abatement; <ls>Ku. 2. 20.</ls> {@--4@} Cessation, end, destruction; <ls>Śi. 20. 73.</ls> {@--5@} Pacification, appeasement; <ls>Śi. 16. 51.</ls>
